extendedInfo.description: Welcome to the Unforgettable 'Spot the Difference' game! Test your powers of observation and see if you can find the differences in the two photos to become a master detective! Do you have keen eyes? Then it won't be difficult for you to find differences between the two pictures in these spot the difference games. These games are all about being sharp and quick. A closed eye, a different haircut. This may seem simple to spot but looks can be deceiving. Find out for yourself and enjoy!The game is also know as "Find it", famous from the Photo play games. Two similar photos, cartoons, or illustrations are shown. It's up to you to spot the differences.We've collected lots of "find the differences" games or "find it" games for you. Have fun and don't forget to blink now and then!In our application you will have to find differences in Anime Manga characters:â Narutoâ Kyoya Ootori, Ouran High School Host Clubâ Lavi From D Gray Manâ Mitsukuni Haninozuka, Ouran High School Host Clubâ Kaoru Matsubara, Powerpuff Girls Zâ Momoko Akatsutsumi, Powerpuff Girls Zâ Tomoki Sakurai, Sora no Otoshimonoâ Sunako Kirishiki, Sunako Kirishiki From Shikiâ Toshio Ozaki, Toshio Ozaki From Shikiâ Yuuki Natsuno, Yuuki Natsuno From Shikiâ Neuro Nougami From Majin Tantei Nougamiâ Kurisu Makise, Kurisu Makise From Steins Gateâ Rintarou, Rintarou Okabe From Steins Gateâ Chocolat, Chocolat from Sugar Sugar Runeâ Asuna From NegimaFind The Difference or also called Spot The Difference is a name given to a puzzle game where two versions of an image are shown side by side, and the player has to find differences between the two images and spot them using the mouse. Usually, the picture / image on the left is the original, and the image on the right side has the alterations. Spot The Difference games are also known as Photohunt Games.Simply look at the two side-by-side photos for five differences. When you find one, click on the difference on the photo. If you are correct, a circle will appear around your selection. You will want to move rather quickly, as you will only have 120 seconds to complete each round. There will be five rounds to complete the 'Spot the Difference' game. Many spot the difference images include recognizable patterned objects (e.g. a polka dot dress) or those with regular shapes and designs, like pumpkins. When you see an object with a built-in pattern, you can often bet that a difference will exist between the objectâs patterns in both pictures.Play Spot the Difference for free, a hidden object puzzler featuring more than 100 levels of challenging, visually stunning images. The best new spot the difference game on the Android Market. Enjoy multiple ways to train your brain for expert difference detection.Good luck! Enjoy our online differences games have fun!

reviews.title: Good but...
reviews.comment: It\'s good and I live the pictures, but I hate having to start back at the beginning when I run out of time
reviews.author: Linnea Sharelove
